fixes.name: Delta Down FX Select Diff
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T Fix FX Select] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign]
fixes.solution_explanation: Mapped Tableau row-level multiplication to DAX by converting each field reference to the table-qualified form 'TableName'[ColumnName] and using the * operator for multiplication. The expression is kept inline because it is short.
fixes.type_changed_reason: A dependent calculated field ('Delta Down T Fix FX Select') references a Tableau parameter ([Parameters].[FXSelection]), and any expression that depends on parameters must be implemented as a measure.
